New Records: Maximilian Beier made his senior international debut and nearly scored a hat-trick
Key Match Events: Germany and Ukraine drew 0-0 in their Euro 2024 warm-up friendly
Maximilian Beier's introduction as a substitute was a key moment
Pre-Game Insights: Several key players were missing due to the Champions League final
Julian Nagelsmann faced selection headaches with Timo Werner and Serge Gnabry left out
Post-Match Reflections: The draw was frustrating for Germany
Maximilian Beier's performance could impact future selections
Miscellaneous Highlights: Germany will face Greece in their next warm-up
